author: jwoolley
msg: Follow the usual pattern (eg apr/file_io/unix/open.c) for cleanups.

author: jwoolley
msg: register a cleanup on the pool passed to apr_bucket_alloc_create().  there
were mixed feelings in the group about whether we should do this or not,
but it seems that the majority feel it *should* be done.  it's more consistent
with the rest of APR this way I suppose.

author: jwoolley
msg: The brigade cleanup should only happen in the "normal" pool cleanup, not

author: bjh
msg: Manually created bucket needs bucket allocator field set.
This fixes a segfault parsing large SSIs on non-mmap systems.

author: gstein
msg: Port over some fixes to mod_dav 1.0 so that the Apache 2.0 DAV code
will pass the "litmus" DAV test tool.
In particular, we need to properly handle empty namespaces properly.
